entry.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

entry.title: D4C4N/EmilEmoji: 🎉 Emil Emoji - A Discord bot that announces newly added emojis in a user-specified channel in your server. Lightweight, easy to set up, and customizable. Perfect for keeping your community updated with the latest emotes! 🚀
entry.content: 🎉 Emil Emoji - A Discord bot that announces newly added emojis in a user-specified channel in your server. Lightweight, easy to set up, and customizable. Perfect for keeping your community updated with the latest emotes! 🚀

entry.title: RyanIdris41/Salinaka-E-Comerece-Website: Salinaka is a simple e-commerce web app built with React JS, TypeScript, and Firebase. It allows users to browse products, manage accounts, and lets admins perform CRUD operations. The app supports Firebase authentication and Firestore for data storage, providing a lightweight, easy-to-deploy solution
entry.content: Salinaka is a simple e-commerce web app built with React JS, TypeScript, and Firebase. It allows users to browse products, manage accounts, and lets admins perform CRUD operations. The app supports Firebase authentication and Firestore for data storage, providing a lightweight, easy-to-deploy solution

entry.title: i24k3/onlyjs: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.

entry.title: manishgun/json-undo: A lightweight library for tracking changes in JSON objects with undo and redo functionality. Efficiently manages changes without duplicating entire objects, ideal for memory-sensitive applications.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
entry.content: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
